{"city": "Concord", "state": "CA", "name": "Community Produce Program", "address": "2000 Sierra Rd,", "phone": "925-676-4111", "notes": "Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Get Food Concord Printer Friendly List Community Produce Program Families and individuals can pick up to 20 pounds of FREE fresh produce twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Cambridge Elementary School , 1135 Lacey Ln, Concord , 1st & 3rd Saturday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. La Clinica Monument , 2000 Sierra Rd, Concord , 2nd & 4th Sunday 10:00-11:00am.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Monument Crisis Center , 1990 Market St, Concord , 2nd & 4th Monday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Mt. Diablo High School , 2611 East St, Concord , 1st & 3rd Saturday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Located near the basketball court. Please bring two bags with handles. St. Bonaventure's Church , 5562 Clayton Rd, Concord , 1st & 3rd Wednesday 4:00-5:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. WIC Concord , 2731 Systron Drive, Concord , 1st & 3rd Wednesday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Located at the rear of the WIC building. Please bring two bags with handles. Mobile Pantry Distribution Families and individuals can pick up FREE fresh produce, proteins, dairy and a variety of nonperishable food once or twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Mt. Diablo Adult Education (Loma Vista) , 1266 San Carlos Ave, Concord , 1st & 3rd Thursday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Distribution is in the solar panel parking lot, located at the back of the school. Look for the Food Bank box truck. Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Concord International Seventh-day Adventist , 1655 West St, Concord , Thursday 5:00-6:30pm. Phone: 925-676-4111 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Good Shepherd Lutheran Church , 4000 Clayton Rd, Concord , Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday & Friday 10:30am-12:30pm. Phone: 925-768-9087 or 925-864-9266 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Monument Crisis Center , 1990 Market St, Concord , Monday-Wednesday 9:00am-12:00pm.
							Valid ID required. Contra Costa residents only. Phone: 925-825-7751 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Queen of All Saints (SVdP) , 2390 Grant St, Concord , Wednesday 9:30-11:30am
3rd Saturday 10:00-11:00am. Phone: 925-609-5944 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Refuge Food Pantry , 1187 Meadow Ln, Concord , Tuesday 3:30-5:30pm
or schedule a food locker pick-up at www.orderahead.org ..
							Along with a regular Tuesday food distribution, Refuge offers a food locker pick-up service. Order in advance and pick up at your scheduled time. Schedule yours at www.orderahead.org . Phone: 925-671-0702 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Salvation Army Concord , 3950 Clayton Rd, Concord , Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday & Friday 10:00-11:45am & 1:00-3:00pm. Phone: 925-676-6180 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. SHARE (First Christian Church) , 3039 Willow Pass Rd, Concord , Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday & Friday 10:00am-1:30pm. Phone: 925-827-4273 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. St. Bonaventure's Church (Drive-Thru), 5562 Clayton Rd, Concord , Tuesday 8:30-10:00am. Phone: 925-672-5800 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. St. Francis of Assisi (SVdP) , 860 Oak Grove Rd, Concord , Wednesday & Saturday 9:00-11:30am. Phone: 925-682-5811 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. The Bay Church: Compassion Ministries , 4725 Evora Rd, Concord , Saturday 1:30-3:30pm.
							Showers available for unhoused. Phone: 925-458-9100 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). Good Shepherd Lutheran Church , 4000 Clayton Rd, Concord , 1st and 3rd Thursday 9:00-10:00am. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
Fairfield, CA 94533 GET HELP Find Food CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Contact Us 855-309-FOOD (3663) info@foodbankccs.org How to Help Ways to Give Donate Food Volunteer Advocate Become a Partner Agency Food Bank Updates Blog Events Newsroom Newsletter Sign-up Careers Facebook Twitter Youtube Instagram Linkedin 501(c)(3) Organization | Federal Tax ID# 94-2418054 Copyright © 2025 Cookie Settings This institution is an equal opportunity provider | Site Map | Privacy Policy Website Design and Development by MIGHTYminnow", "latitude": 37.952212355077, "longitude": -122.036839128489, "source": "food_bank_of_contra_costa_and_solano_ca", "food_bank": "Food Bank of Contra Costa and Solano"}
